title: Pre-Service Teacher Entrepreneurial Thinking Development Project: Collaborative Problem Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science education knowledge and fundamental digital device usage skills
context.additional_context: Conducted in a smartphone-based constrained technology environment, targeting application in science education settings

learning_goals: Learners will be able to explain the core elements of entrepreneurial thinking (opportunity discovery, risk management, creative problem-solving) through 4 weeks of collaborative project-based learning.
Learners will be able to complete a project analyzing real-world problems in community science education and proposing solutions using smartphone-based tools.
Learners will be able to refine educational innovation ideas based on peer feedback and explain their social value according to evaluation criteria.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
